self_post_text: a simple text to write on the user wall
self_post_type: type of publication, text, image, video
fbpage_url: url to the facebook page to share a publication from
actor_list: list of actors expected on the post page
post_url: post_url to test the comments and reactions and moderation
post_comment_text: text to use as comment on the post
users_valid: list of valid usernames to unhidden the comments from
users_invalid: list of invalid usernames to hide comments from
